message: Let's start with a fair split.  I'm willing to give you 10% of the money.
That's not fair, Alice. I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor. Take it or leave it.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I won't accept anything less than a 60/40 split in my favor.  This way, we both get a decent amount.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere. I'm willing to go slightly above the middle point, but I need you to meet me closer.  55/45 is my final offer.
